DOC.HEADLINE: 1st LD Writethru: Blast at Thai gov't TV channel, no injury

TEXT.P: National Broadcasting Services of Thailand (NBT) headquarters on Vapavadee road in Bangkok was attacked by an M79 grenade on Tuesday afternoon, but there was no report of death and injury.
The grenade landed at the parking area at 1:25 p.m., damaging many cars, local media reported.
NBT is a national public service broadcaster in the Kingdom of Thailand, owned and operated by Government's Public Relations Department.
